DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: : A 4-item short form of the PROMIS v2.0 Cognitive Function scale. It assesses difficulties with leisure activities, family activities, doing usual work (in and out of the home), and doing desired activities with friends:The sum of a set of numeric values.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a
Concepts.definition: A 4-item short form of the PROMIS v2.0 Cognitive Function scale. It assesses difficulties with leisure activities, family activities, doing usual work (in and out of the home), and doing desired activities with friends.

Property.preferredDefinition: The sum of a set of numeric values.

Concepts.definition: The sum of a set of numeric values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Value expressed as a number with 3 total digits and no decimals.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:No Value Exists:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
